name: Die of Fate
description: The evil sorceress Agatha the Cruel placed a curse on your village of Corinthia. Locking away you and the rest of your fellow villagers in a dice prison of her own design. Your world is now fractured, and folded around the sides of this die. You must battle through the streets of your humble home, defeating the vile sorceress minions to find your way through to her lair. Once there, only your die of power will allow you to defeat the evil sorceress! Once defeated, her evil spell will end and return your village to normal. The fate of Corinthia is in your hands!
